00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoSceneKit.h>
00040 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoNodeKitListPart.h>
00041 
00042 #include "CmdLightKitModified.h"
00043 #include "SceneModel.h"
00044 #include "tgf.h"
00045 #include "TLightKit.h"
00046 
00053 CmdLightKitModified::CmdLightKitModified( TLightKit* newLightKit, SoSceneKit* scene, SceneModel& sceneModel, QUndoCommand* parent )
00054 : QUndoCommand("Modify LightKit", parent),
00055   m_previousLightKit( false ),
00056   m_previousAzimuth( 0 ),
00057   m_previousZenith( 0 ),
00058   m_pPreviousSunShape( 0 ),
00059   m_pNewLightKit( 0 ),
00060   m_scene( scene ),
00061   m_pModel( &sceneModel )
00062 {
00063     if( newLightKit == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdLightKitModified called with NULL TLightKit*" );
00064     m_pNewLightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( newLightKit->copy( true ) );
00065     m_pNewLightKit->ref();
00066 
00067     if( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) )
00068     {
00069         m_previousLightKit = true;
00070         TLightKit* lightKit = dynamic_cast< TLightKit* >( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) );
00071         if( lightKit )
00072         {
00073                         m_previousAzimuth = lightKit->azimuth.getValue();
00074                         m_previousZenith = lightKit->zenith.getValue();
00075 
00076                         m_pPreviousSunShape = dynamic_cast< TSunShape* >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false )->copy( true ) );
00077                         if( m_pPreviousSunShape ) m_pPreviousSunShape->ref();
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00085 CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified()
00086 {
00087         m_pNewLightKit->unref();
00088         if( m_previousLightKit )
00089         {
00090                 m_pPreviousSunShape->unref();
00091         }
00092 }
00093 
00098 void CmdLightKitModified::undo()
00099 {
00100         if( m_previousLightKit )
00101     {
00102         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00103         lightKit->setPart("tsunshape", m_pPreviousSunShape );
00104                 lightKit->ChangePosition( m_previousAzimuth, m_previousZenith );
00105     }
00106     else        m_pModel->RemoveLightNode( *m_pNewLightKit );
00107 }
00108 
00114 void CmdLightKitModified::redo( )
00115 {
00116         if( !m_previousLightKit )
00117         {
00118                  m_pModel->InsertLightNode( *m_pNewLightKit );
00119         }
00120         else
00121         {
00122                 TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00123 
00124                 TSunShape* sunhape =static_cast< TSunShape* > ( m_pNewLightKit->getPart("tsunshape", false) );
00125                 lightKit->setPart("tsunshape", sunhape );
00126 
00127                 lightKit->ChangePosition( m_pNewLightKit->azimuth.getValue(), m_pNewLightKit->zenith.getValue() );
00128         }
00129 
00130 }
